product_name: prAna Limited Edition Chalk Bag - 2014 Closeout
long_description: Limited Edition Chalk Bags are autographed by Chris Sharma. 10% of the sales help fund Sharmafund, a foundation that teaches climbing and outdoor ethics to underprivileged kids.
